mapper.sql: t.F_PID, T.F_TENANTS_PID, T.F_DEVICE_PID, T.F_DEVICE_DID, T.F_FILE_PID, T.F_FILE_TYPE, T.F_CONTENT, T.F_STOP_TIME, T.F_STATUS, T.F_SORT, T.F_C1, T.F_C2, T.F_C3, T.F_C4, T.F_C5, t.F_SYS_FLAG, t.F_REMARK, t.F_LAST_MODIFIER, t.F_LAST_MODIFIED_TIME, t.F_CREATOR, t.F_CREATE_TIME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_ADVERT_HOME ( F_PID, F_TENANTS_PID, F_DEVICE_PID, F_DEVICE_DID, F_FILE_PID, F_FILE_TYPE, F_CONTENT, F_STOP_TIME, F_STATUS, F_SORT, F_C1, F_C2, F_C3, F_C4, F_C5, F_SYS_FLAG, F_REMARK, F_LAST_MODIFIER, F_LAST_MODIFIED_TIME, F_CREATOR, F_CREATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenants_pid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{device_pid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{device_did, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{file_pid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{file_type, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stop_time, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sort, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{c1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{c2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{c3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{c4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{c5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{sysFlag, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifier, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifiedTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO T_ADVERT_HOME ( F_PID, F_TENANTS_PID, F_DEVICE_PID, F_DEVICE_DID, F_FILE_PID, F_FILE_TYPE, F_CONTENT, F_STOP_TIME, F_STATUS, F_SORT, F_C1, F_C2, F_C3, F_C4, F_C5, F_SYS_FLAG, F_REMARK, F_LAST_MODIFIER, F_LAST_MODIFIED_TIME, F_CREATOR, F_CREATE_TIME )
SELECT #{entity.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.tenants_pid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.device_pid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.device_did, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.file_pid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.file_type, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{entity.content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.stop_time, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{entity.status, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{entity.sort, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{entity.c1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.c2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.c3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.c4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.c5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{entity.sysFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.lastModifiedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} FROM DUAL
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM T_ADVERT_HOME T
order by t.f_sort, t.F_CREATE_TIME desc
